summary: A modders resource making some basic geometric water meshes available for unsual water features.
descriptionHtml:
Water Meshes

A variety of water meshes for use in dungeon level design, they are not meant to be butted together but scaled for use where you need an unusual un-broken expanse of water.

Future plans: I have provided some basic geometric shapes but there may be some shapes that I have not covered, so leave a comment / request and I'll see about including it. However that doesn't mean I'm going to be doing any pretzel shapes.

I have included an esp incase you want to check them out, just "coc testwater".
author: Mindboggles
